title: window.name via document.write
description: Demonstrates a DOM-based XSS where window.name is written directly into the document with document.write().
objectives: Recognize that window.name can be attacker-controlled across navigations.
Identify document.write() as the unsafe sink.
Exploit control of window.name to run arbitrary script.
hints: Set window.name to HTML or script in DevTools or a prior page, then load this case.
You can also pass ?q=<payload> to populate window.name before document.write runs.
